comments:
Hi  , 

I am a new user to the forum .Could you tell me whats wrong with my eclipse3.2 IDE. When I run the eclipse in debug mode, the variables view 
displays an error message instead of displaying the variable names & values. 

Regards, 

Ajith 

The variables view displays an error message :

Does this happen every time you try to debug something?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Does this happen every time you try to debug something?

No. It just happens when I open a specific project's workspace.

It sounds like one of the pesisted weight values for the sash form is not valid (less than 0). 

We should check for this case when we initialize the view, and when we call the method getLastSashWeights().

Changed init() and getLastSashWeights() to check if sash form values are valid.

fixed in HEAD

Verified

Darin S, please mark bug as verified or reassign to CWindatt@ca.ibm.com
